item.title: Sun Core by ZeroKun265!
item.description: Basic Info: Status: Complete Platforms: Windows Authors: ZeroKun265(Me) Genres: Platformer “The Making” Page: [[/games-developement/Sun-Core-Making | Click here]] Sun Core Your friend has been kidnapped by monsters and brought to the core of the sun: it’s up to you, a solar creature, to rescue him.
